arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo wife Georgina Rodriguez shuts mouths with her education with people
arts.sum: T he spotlight was once again on Georgina Rodriguez as she arrived at a high profile fashion event in Paris, but this time, it was for reasons other than her glamorous appearance. Instead of walking past fans or ignoring their greetings, Georgina took the time to acknowledge everyone with a warm, composed demeanor.
